about.about: Designed to help fans explore the world of movies / shows and decide what to watch, Conta pra nos is an application that allows ratings (from 0 to 10) and comments on what was watched. The aim is entertainment, whether it is refreshing the memory of a film, program / cast, finding the best film / program to watch or just sharing your knowledge and opinions about what has been watched.
